UnifiedMeeting.name: UnifiedMeeting
UnifiedMeeting.description: Represents a meeting that was captured or synced from an Event record.

ActivityDateTime.description: The date and time of the meeting in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.

DetailId.description: The ID of the object that contains detailed activity-specific information. The object depends on the activity type. For example, the detail for a Task activity is a Task object. The detail for an Event activity is an Event object.

IsInsightAvailable.description: Indicates whether the activity has an insight associated with it (true) or not (false).

Snippet.description: An abbreviation of the event description. This field has a maximum length of 255 characters.

Subject.description: Contains the subject of the meeting.
